title: Rotation - Compare v and a of ball and disk

content.description: Which of the following correctly compare <math alttext="v sub disk" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="alpha sub disk" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> with <math alttext="v sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="alpha sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>?
content.question: Angular Acceleration Velocity of Center of Mass A <math alttext="alpha sub disk is greater than alpha sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> <math alttext="v sub disk is less than v sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> B <math alttext="alpha sub disk is less than alpha sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> <math alttext="v disk is less than v sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> C <math alttext="alpha sub disk is greater than alpha sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> <math alttext="v sub disk is greater than v sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> D <math alttext="alpha sub disk is less than alpha sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>α</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> <math alttext="v sub disk is greater than v sub hoop" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>disk</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>hoop</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
